title: Clavicle Fracture Protocol
details: Apply sterile dressing, initiate tetanus prophylaxis. Use splint or immobilization where appropriate.

title: Blunt Abdominal Trauma Protocol
details: Secure airway, apply high-flow oxygen, and prepare for potential intubation. Monitor ABG and lactate levels.

title: Cardiac Tamponade Protocol
details: Document time of injury, mechanism, and initial findings. Communicate with receiving facility for transfer.

title: Patella Fracture Protocol
details: Administer IV fluids, analgesics, and prophylactic antibiotics. Monitor vitals and reassess every 15 minutes.

title: Esophageal Injury Protocol
details: Administer IV fluids, analgesics, and prophylactic antibiotics. Monitor vitals and reassess every 15 minutes.

title: Spinal Cord Injury Protocol
details: Insert Foley catheter and NG tube as indicated. Maintain spinal precautions and monitor for neurological changes.

title: Clavicle Fracture Protocol
details: Elevate affected limb, apply cold compress, and initiate pain management protocol. Avoid delays in intervention.

title: Eclampsia Protocol
details: Administer IV fluids, analgesics, and prophylactic antibiotics. Monitor vitals and reassess every 15 minutes.

title: Elbow Injury Protocol
details: Insert Foley catheter and NG tube as indicated. Maintain spinal precautions and monitor for neurological changes.

title: Eclampsia Protocol
details: If GCS <8, intubate. Initiate seizure prophylaxis, monitor ICP and cerebral perfusion pressure closely.

title: Electrical Burn Protocol
details: Insert Foley catheter and NG tube as indicated. Maintain spinal precautions and monitor for neurological changes.

title: Traumatic Brain Injury Protocol
details: Insert Foley catheter and NG tube as indicated. Maintain spinal precautions and monitor for neurological changes.

title: Dental Trauma Protocol
details: Elevate affected limb, apply cold compress, and initiate pain management protocol. Avoid delays in intervention.

title: Wrist Fracture Protocol
details: Prepare for OR if unstable. Consult trauma, ortho, or neuro teams depending on injury site.

title: Elbow Injury Protocol
details: Elevate affected limb, apply cold compress, and initiate pain management protocol. Avoid delays in intervention.

title: Wrist Fracture Protocol
details: If GCS <8, intubate. Initiate seizure prophylaxis, monitor ICP and cerebral perfusion pressure closely.

title: Esophageal Injury Protocol
details: Administer IV fluids, analgesics, and prophylactic antibiotics. Monitor vitals and reassess every 15 minutes.

title: Frostbite Protocol
details: If GCS <8, intubate. Initiate seizure prophylaxis, monitor ICP and cerebral perfusion pressure closely.

title: Esophageal Injury Protocol
details: Prepare for OR if unstable. Consult trauma, ortho, or neuro teams depending on injury site.

title: Spleen Injury Protocol
details: Insert Foley catheter and NG tube as indicated. Maintain spinal precautions and monitor for neurological changes.

title: Facial Trauma Protocol
details: Apply sterile dressing, initiate tetanus prophylaxis. Use splint or immobilization where appropriate.

title: Scalp Laceration Protocol
details: Insert Foley catheter and NG tube as indicated. Maintain spinal precautions and monitor for neurological changes.
